DOC.brief_summary: The study determine efficacy ALKS 9072 ( also know aripiprazole lauroxil ALKS 9070 ) treatment schizophrenia subject experience acute exacerbation .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety ALKS 9072 ( Also Known Aripiprazole Lauroxil , ALKS 9070 , ARISTADA ) Subjects With Schizophrenia
DOC.criteria: Diagnosis schizophrenia accord DSMIVTR criterion Has able achieve outpatient status 3 month past year Body mass index ( BMI ) 18.5 40.0 kg/m2 ( inclusive ) Resides stable living situation Willing able confine inpatient study unit 2 week longer History poor inadequate clinical response treatment aripiprazole History treatment resistance Known suspect intolerance , allergy , hypersensitivity aripiprazole , ingredient , antipsychotic agent , INTRALIPID ( include peanut , soy , egg , glycerol ) Diagnosis current substance dependence ( include alcohol ) Pregnant , lactating , breastfeed Receipt antipsychotic medication IM injection within 60 day Screening Current involuntary hospitalization incarceration Hospitalized 30 day 90 day Screening Additional inclusion/exclusion criterion may apply .
